attributes.action: For secondary school students to be aloud to go to the toilet during lesson time
attributes.background: My younger siblings have experienced not being able to go to the toilet during their lessons which has lead to them becoming ill and uncomfortable, and all the teachers say is 'you should have gone at your proposed time to go.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for your school to make.
